text: Mwesi wakuchimbichika kwa mwesi wakuchimbichika, soni ichindu yakuchimbichika (naga utyosyedwe uchimbichimbi wakweo) iwichilidwe mbusyo, sano jwantendele uwwanga nombe jenumanja mum'buchisyani uwwangao mwakulandana ni mwantendele wanganyammwe uwwanga, soni mun'jogopani Allah, ni manyililani yanti Allah ali pamo ni waoga (wakun'jogopa Jwalakwe)
